title: Sheetfed Printing Technology
description: Theory, practice and application of sheetfed printing and plate technology for commercial, book, advertising, catalog, packaging and reprographic segments of the printing industry. Press configurations, materials, computerized press controls, workflow, pressroom management, coating and quality control. Plate types, quality and new technologies for sheetfed printing. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: GRC 211 or GRC 212 and Graphic Communication majors only
